title: Can I dl patch on phone then give to pc to patch
body: My dl speed is slow. I can still play the game fine, but the dl takes days. Can I instant download the patch then transfer to pc and have it do its thing or?

replies.body: We don't currently have an official way for you to download the patch via phone, but you may have some luck by reconfiguring some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Use that network guide to make some adjustments, and let me know if that helps!
